extendedInfo.description: Dash Diet is a recipe app that provides an introduction to eating that can help you lead a healthier life. âââââââââââââââââââââââ "Amazing Recipes!!! NONE of the other apps have recipes like these!! The pictures are beautiful and incredibly inspiring!! - Ashley Dondero "Great and simple to read - Great range of meal ideas!" - Sacha Meriaud "Great app - The app delivers what it promises and that is tons of healthy recipes. It is easy and fun to use this app." - Christian Betty "I really love this app!" - LaTasha Royal âââââââââââââââââââââââ The DASH diet was developed by the The National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI). Studies have shown that nutrients such as potassium, calcium, protein, and fiber are crucial to fending off or fighting high blood pressure. You donât have to track each one, though. Just emphasize the foods youâve always been told to eat (fruits, veggies, whole grains, lean protein, and low-fat dairy), while shunning those weâve grown to love (calorie- and fat-laden sweets and red meat). Top it all off by cutting back on salt, and voilÃ ! This diet is similar in style to other popular diets you may have heard of, such as the TLC diet, mediterranean diet, and the Mayo Clinic diet. Rigorous studies show DASH can lower blood pressure, which if too high can trigger heart disease, heart failure, and stroke. (In fact, the name DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertensionâhypertension being the medical term for high blood pressure.) Itâs also been shown to increase âgoodâ HDL cholesterol and decrease âbadâ LDL cholesterol and triglycerides, a fatty substance that in excess has been linked to heart disease. Overall, DASH reflects the medical communityâs widely accepted definition of a heart-healthy dietâit's heavy on fruits and vegetables and light on saturated fat, sugar, and salt. Features â Elegant and intuitive interface â Over a dozen Dash Diet recipes to get you started â Includes pertinent nutrition information for each recipe â Recipes for all meal types including: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack â Star your favorites for easy reference â Filter menu to sort â Search feature to quickly find your favorite recipe Download the Dash Diet app and start feeling healthier today! ------- Disclaimer: The Dash Diet app is only intended to provide general information, without independent verification of the accuracy of the information provided to it, and the information is specifically not intended to be a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment by your physician or other health care professional. You should consult an appropriate professional for specific advice tailored to your specific situation. reviews.title: Skip this app
reviews.comment: Only contains a few recipes and nothing more. Have to upgrade for more.
reviews.author: michael brand
